mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tech_id AS "techId", a.tech_name AS "techName", a.img_type AS "imgType", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_technician_images( id, tech_id, tech_name, img_type, img_url, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{techId}, #{techName}, #{imgType}, #{imgUrl}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE service_technician_images SET tech_id = #{techId}, tech_name = #{techName}, img_type = #{imgType}, img_url = #{imgUrl}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
